column5: Has anyone driven past the Wabagoon Falls north of Vermillion Bay lately and if so are they way up like last spring ? We usually stop there and catch a few northern before going to our camp but last year it was so high we could not fish it. 16 days and a wake up and the excitement is almost unbearable. Does the excitement ever fade away as the years pass? I hope not.... Good luck to all those fishing the opener and leave some fish for the rest of us....

[font color=green size=3][b]Last week the falls was still moving a lot of water, although not as much as at the end of April. The area below the falls appeared high, there might be something holding the flow back downstream.
Thank you sir I hope it slows down some more in the next 2 weeks we have caught alot of nice northern there
